website_summaries.verdict: Long lasting formula is perfect for those who don't have time for constant touch-ups.
pros: Color and shine last roughly 8 hours, only requiring minor touch ups after meals
Adds depth to existing lipstick, but can also be worn on its own
Goes on smoothly, not as sticky as other glosses
cons: Strong sugary scents do not appeal to all users

customer_reviews.title: Hi gloss with no stickiness
customer_reviews.text: Got this lipgloss on a deal. Absolutely love that it came in a dual pack. The glass has high shine and not sticky. I love the color pay off. It makes your lips look juicy. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Prettypinkpearl

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of the gloss but it is NOT 8 hr wear. Not even 8 minutes. As long as you don't drink, eat or do anything else around your mouth it will be fine. It is sticky and you know you're wearing it. Was disappointed that it wasn't as promised but I do love the color and the gloss itself isn't terrible - just your regular gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: My Daily Gloss
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product for my daily wear. It is soft and has a pleasant “flavor.” However, I don’t view this as an 8 hour gloss and do reapply relatively often. Highly recommend! Color pictured: Blush 115
customer_reviews.author: Kelley M.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This does stay on longer than your average gloss. I will repurchase. I have more mature skin and I like to use mature skin and I like to use this type of gloss because it doesn't settle in to the fine lines of my lips type of glass because it doesn't settle in to the fine lines of my lips
customer_reviews.author: M.R.F.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, nice packaging, great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. I got "Bloom." It looked brighter online but reviews said its sorta sheer, which is the truth. I tend to go for nudes, pinks and mauves for everyday wear. This is a nice topper for a nude lip to add some dimension and different color. Great deal! It's cheaper here than on Ulta so I figured why not?
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, light color
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice. light, neutral shade - not much pink and mostly neutral shine. It lasts pretty well as long as you don't eat, holds up pretty good for drinking. I like it but am going to order one more pink. The applicator is kind of sponge like instead of a brush, it's different than other brands but easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: C. Crocker

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the color Petal. Not much color, very pale, not much pigment. I didn't find it to be very lasting, and it was a stickier gloss. I buy a lot of lip products, it's kind of my thing. This is not a keeper, and I won't try other colors. I was pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip gloss because it’s not sticky and it’s not dry but it does last a long time. It last longer than any of my other lip glosses.
customer_reviews.author: Megababy365

customer_reviews.title: It does last
customer_reviews.text: But, I feel like it is tacky and makes my lips stick together. I keep wanting to put some more moisture on my lips. After putting on my regular gloss on top, my lips aren't feeling tacky or sticking together and I still have the color and shine.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: but the good thing is its not sticky at all
customer_reviews.text: more sheer color than anything, but the good thing is its not sticky at all. needs frequent reapplication as it is a lip gloss. Goes on smoothly and has great shine. Just thought it would be more pigmented.
customer_reviews.author: Greek goddess

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, terrible longevity
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hoping it would be something I could wear for multiple hours without having to worry about needing to reapply constantly. This is a classic cast of you-get-what-you-pay-for. I liked the color, but the texture, taste, and longevity are all around awful. This stuff is super sticky. I had to reply less than an hour after putting it on. Not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: KayE

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite products! I have ordered so many of these through the years and continue to get compliments on this color. It works very well with a plummy lip liner.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, could be better
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, goes great with or without my favorite lipstick. Doesn't really last as long as i had hoped, I find myself reapplying several times during the evening. Not keen on the scent/taste though, wishe it had some flavoring. Not that I want to eat it...
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Watterson

customer_reviews.title: No seal on the item I received!
customer_reviews.text: Afraid to use it because there was no seal on lid and the lid came off very very easily, like it had been used before! Return was very easy, thank you for that.
customer_reviews.author: Tereerose

customer_reviews.title: too many sparkles
customer_reviews.text: okay, not great, too many sparkles that are not necessary, and not so good for the environment or fish. Had I known, i would not have bought.
customer_reviews.author: justmaybe

customer_reviews.title: Love it... maybe discontinued
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this a long time. I prefer a neutral color and it’s my favorite. I think it’s discontinued...which is always the case for everyone who loves one particular item.
customer_reviews.author: C. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY lip product I’ve used consistently for many, many years.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I’m able to get this color through Amazon. I’ve used it for years. It’s perfect for putting on most colors (light and dark) for a little shine and moisture without completely changing the color.
customer_reviews.author: wkg96

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely color. I'm sticking with this shade from now on. FYI: I'm light completed and my hair is silver, so I'm taking my coloring into consideration.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally in love with this Lip Gloss, Raisin. Was not sure how the color would look on me but it is PERFECT and it stays on all day long. I reapplied it after 8 hours but really did not need to.
customer_reviews.author: Victory Grace Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Gloss
customer_reviews.text: Good color, good shine, stays on but comes right off if you do anything. It is not on for 8 hours like other L'oreal lip colors.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: While the color is lovely and feels good, it is gone in 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Nannette

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color but still an ok shade for me
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product, but the shade I ordered didn't match the picture. Way more pink than gold. Still looked good though. Especially layered on top of a thicker lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bryan-Combs

customer_reviews.title: This is BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Currently my favorite "lipstick", it lasts, the color is beautiful, it's glossy, and it can be worn alone or to top off any number of other lipsticks for a bit of shine and a teeny bit of glimmer. My current #1, versatile and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Flanamom

customer_reviews.title: it too bad because its a beautiful nude color that i wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: ladies be careful of l'oreal it did not have any kind of protection seal and amazon sent me 2 of them because we thought it was a mishap no such luck so for safety sake do not buy this product. it too bad because its a beautiful nude color that i wanted goes with almost all complexions.
customer_reviews.author: prizzyskky

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to enhance my natural lip color and this one is great! Nice shine and it lasts a long time. I like how super shiny it is. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Good price... but it’s a gloss. Doesn’t stay on for long
customer_reviews.text: Does not have a flavor... I don’t think I saw that advertised. Because it’s a gloss does Not stay on for long. But color is beautiful. Price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Natural with a hint of deep color
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip gloss! Sangria is such a perfectly natural looking color and just versatile enough to wear everyday, with or without liner, for dressing up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia EST

customer_reviews.title: My fave lipgloss color
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite lip gloss and color for years. Its hard to get in stores and they have changed the packaging... so thankfully I found it here. Its the prettiest color for summer! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza

customer_reviews.title: its gloss
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, its not long ware like it says but looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lip gloss! I got it in the Pink Topaz. It is a very beautiful, soft pink. The gloss is creamy and smooth and goes on very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love this gloss!
customer_reviews.text: It’s actually a really nice color and hydrating gloss. I highly recommend it, and can’t beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Got petal lip gloss. Seems a bit different from ...
customer_reviews.text: Got petal lip gloss. Seems a bit different from what I remembered. More glitter in it and a bit of a gold also.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Great color, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I love this color. If you want it darker, just apply more. A light application adds the perfect amount of moisture and not too bright.
customer_reviews.author: swildshe

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shimmery color and it does last a while
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lip gloss in this color makes your lips look natural yet beautiful. I totally cannot live without these I have one in every purse.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Felix

customer_reviews.title: True color and looks beautiful. And a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Like the color and the fact that it stays on a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Frender

customer_reviews.title: Lip Gloass
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand/type/color for 10+ years now. Works well, never sticky or gooy.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Moore

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt last or plump lips
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt last more than 5 mins, doesn't make lips looker fuller at all. Waste od money. Dont recommends.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Glossy
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, I was trying to get something that was close to a lip gloss from pure illumination that is no longer being sold. It’s ok for back up.
customer_reviews.author: Yolonda Pugh

customer_reviews.title: great color
customer_reviews.text: Really like the color of this gloss, however the package came an it wasn't sealed. I bought two of these. Don't want to go through the hassle of sending this product back. I will not waste any more money, I'll just buy them directly from a store.
customer_reviews.author: Taneshia

customer_reviews.title: Great quick sheer color
customer_reviews.text: Love the raisin color! Hope they never stop making this. It’s the perfect amount of sheer too.
customer_reviews.author: 7-E

customer_reviews.title: NO
customer_reviews.text: THIS HAS METALLIC FLAKES IN IT! DOING NOTHING. ITS GONE IN 10 MINUTES!! I NEED TO STOP TRYING TO BUY COSMETICS ON AMAZON!! DONE
customer_reviews.author: gaw boston

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The color you see in the tube is not the color on your lips. It's very sheer and I don't like the dry feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Lip Gloss
customer_reviews.text: I like this lip gloss very much. I looked in Amazon and was less expensive than the grocery store. I added a few to an order. It has a slight glitter in it and it adds a little, but not too much shine. It does not stay 8hrs, specially if I eat or drink. I like this light pink color. Looks good on my light skin.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Bee

customer_reviews.title: Ew
customer_reviews.text: This sheet right here is soooo nasty and sticky and disgusting. All lint sticks to your lips. Ew. Double yuck. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Nikola

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and ease of application
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and ease of application. For me, I need to reapply after eating so I can't say that it stays on for 8 hours but it only takes seconds to reapply so it's not a problem. I was unable to find it at local stores but luckily I was able to find it on line. It is easier to apply than lipstick and keeps lips soft and moist.
customer_reviews.author: candidreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty Orange peach color
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty Orange ish peach color I could not find it in stores
customer_reviews.author: Atierney

customer_reviews.title: Getting what was ordered
customer_reviews.text: I would truly like to be able to review this item but it was missing from the box
customer_reviews.author: Kennith C Clay Jr

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this again
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect nude gloss for black girls because I’ve bought many nudes and they look bright pink on my lips and this one just matches perfectly love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: DRY
customer_reviews.text: Not moist enough. My lips felt dry within a half hour of wearing it. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Long Lasting...
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping excellent seller. Doesn’t last 8 hours much less 30 minutes. don’t waste your money if your looking for a long wearing lip color.
customer_reviews.author: TCampbell

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I put this over a sheer lipstick and it really stays put! It is a bit sticky but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: deenzidoodle

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and not sticky
customer_reviews.text: Nice consistency, not sticky like some lip colors that claim to be 8 hour. I don't know that it lasts a full 8 hours, haven't timed it... but it does last longer than your plain ol' lip gloss without that terrible paste-y feel or yucky taste that others "long lasting" products have. Nice compact packaging and the Barely Nude is a natural color for day wear. You might want something a little brighter for evening. I will definitely try some of the other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat X

customer_reviews.title: Been wearing Infallible for years!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered Loreal's Infallible years ago; my daily is Blush, but I've purchased other shades as well. It stays on a long time, doesn't feel sticky, and offers a nice lip sheen without much color. I don't like the look of lipstick, and this is a perfect alternative. It also keeps my lips moist and eliminates the need for Chap Stick. I highly recommend Infallible in "Blush". Very pretty and a tube lasts me about 3 months with daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: allyson c smith

customer_reviews.title: Packaging not sealed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few years and love it. I would have kept the product except that the two glosses I received were not in sealed packages. I am returning the glosses due to unsealed packaging and risk of tampering.
customer_reviews.author: KC RI

customer_reviews.title: Missing the protective seal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lip gloss for my granddaughter, however when it arrived there was no protective seal on it. I wont be giving it as a gift not knowing if this has been opened or not! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Good lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty when mixed with other colors. It's kind of light on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: This glides well on lips. It does not have that metallic taste that other lipstick has. The price much lower than walmart. The color is perfect, not so dark, not so light. It has a brownish to pinkish shade that i love. This has right amount of shine and some glittery finish. fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: she d.

customer_reviews.title: True to Color
customer_reviews.text: True to color. Quite opaque. Best used with a liner to clean up the look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried and True Classic
customer_reviews.text: This color is extremely versatile and flattering. I have worn it for a couple of years now, and I consider it a staple in my lipstick collection. It lasts for quite a while (if not rubbed off with contact), with nice sheen, light feel, and lush color. I love the gold shine, and subtle translucent rust red tint.
customer_reviews.author: hothouseorchid

customer_reviews.title: Very long lasting even when eating absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome to find infallible lip color for so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yuk
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied! Felt like I was putting lard on my lips
customer_reviews.author: Esther Nissenson

customer_reviews.title: Needs tamper seal
customer_reviews.text: It works just okay. #1- It probably lasts 8 hrs if you do not eat or drink anything for 8 hours, but that will never happen. #2- L’oreal Paris should seriously think about adding a tamper seal to their cosmetic products.
customer_reviews.author: Huy

customer_reviews.title: Stays put!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip gloss, it really does last much longer than any other gloss I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: michael k.

customer_reviews.title: Great color and price
customer_reviews.text: Just love this color. Everyone asks for the name. Can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mom to two

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Im not a lip gloss person but if you are then this product is good.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the color but it makes my lips look dry
customer_reviews.author: Christina Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Really stays on!
customer_reviews.text: This lipgloss is great and has good pigment (I purchased the Sunset color). It goes on wet and dries in seconds- yet is not super dry like some of long-lasting lipglosses out there. It stays on for a few hours but if you eat, it will rub off. Overall, for the price, a nice everyday lipgloss.
customer_reviews.author: Kivnier

customer_reviews.title: I really like the product however the petal was a little different ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, I really like the product however the petal was a little different color than I thought. Again, I usually buy this product in the store. M:)
customer_reviews.author: M:)

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: L'Oréal changed the Raisin color. Now it's PINK-ish. No longer a rich reddish/brown
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Loreal 705 sangria lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite go to lip gloss and it wears well
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I collect screen accurate items so I bought this in "Fiery" after reading that it was used on Jennifer Lawrence as Katniss in The Hunger Games. I don't wear lip gloss often because the ones I have tried have been sticky, messy, and ended up drying out my lips. This is the first lip gloss I have owned which I have been completely satisfied with. It lasted a decent amount of time, was not sticky/messy/gross, and it didn't dry out my lips. In fact, it actually seemed to help my lips. I ended up buying more than one because I loved it so much. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SpuffyCullen

customer_reviews.title: Definately ot 8 hours on me.
customer_reviews.text: Definately ot 8 hours on me. I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: No seal
customer_reviews.text: Do not appreciate unsealed products- L’Oréal sends lipsticks with no seal- not goid
customer_reviews.author: Steve Zwisohn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color, with just the right amount of sheerness and shininess and wearability. My favorite! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Debora Baker

customer_reviews.title: Best long lasting lip gloss ever
customer_reviews.text: Best long lasting lip gloss ever! Sangria is my go-to daily lip gloss. Hydrates lips and lasts at least half a day, even after drinking. Cannot be beat for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mountainstar95

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I am a LipGloss addict. I have tried tons of glosses, from Dior to Maybelline. I have a drawer full, in search of the perfect. I have some that I consider pretty close to perfect. But this L'Oreal is not one of them. In defense of Infallible I did buy it in a lite color...Bloom. But I fine it sticky and so sheer that I might as well wear a clear gloss. If you are looking for some color, go darker. Because it is light, I really cannot say if it lasted, and I am not sure I wanted it to. And because of the thick sticky feel, I will not try another color.
customer_reviews.author: The Tam'ster

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product, was a bit dry, believe it may be old
customer_reviews.author: s browder

customer_reviews.title: Great color great shine
customer_reviews.text: Its my go to as far store brand lip gloss
customer_reviews.author: Angela Childs

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: received L'oreal Paris Visible Lift Blur Concealer, 303 Medium, 0.6 Fluid Ounce... Why? 2 different products
customer_reviews.author: Nobie

customer_reviews.title: No opacity
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize this was a gloss. Thought I'd keep it and try it out anyway. It does wear a while but it has little to no color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color issues
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the color I ordered, even though the container indicated the same color name and number. The color was totally different, a dark pink vs. a light rosy color.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA E.

customer_reviews.title: L'Oreal Paris "Barely There" Lip Gloss - is Superb and Stays Moist & Glossy!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for - too bad, the day I ordered, there was only one (1) in stock, and now, they have re-stocked, but the price has gone up, over a dollar, I think. Oh well, that's today's economy - every time you go to the store, prices have risen, but this product, is every thing you would want in a lip gloss!
customer_reviews.author: RhondaJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product - would like more strong colors
customer_reviews.text: My go-to daily gloss. Stays on well, no dreaded lipstick rings as it wears off.
customer_reviews.author: duncancritters

customer_reviews.title: My favorite and for a great price
customer_reviews.text: My favorite and for a great price! I will definitely buy again! Also it arrived on time and well packaged! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The only lip gloss I wear are the Cover Girl fruity flavored ones but I thought I'd give this one a try. The color is pretty, I love the applicator but the product itself is sticky/tacky. I don't like the way it feels on my lips. It also smells kinda weird. Like I said, I'm used to my lip gloss smelling & tasting fruity. (I like my lips often) I wouldn't buy this product again. I am glad I got it on here for the $5 I paid for it instead of the $12 that it sells for in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amilah

customer_reviews.title: Great color--don't like the feel of it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, but it is very "gummy" feeling on your lips. Feels thick and I found I had to reapply 4 times in 8 hours. Did NOT last 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: BookLuvr

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Feels good my lips. Color was much lighter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia K. Gaston

customer_reviews.title: I love this color and cannot find it in stores anymore
customer_reviews.text: I love this color and cannot find it in stores anymore. It is that perfect shade that goes with just about anything. It does not go on dark and heavy. It is light feeling with the right amount of color and sheer mixed together. It doesn't oddly stain your lips like some do after the glossy shine has worn off. The only reason it doesn't get a 5 star is because like any lip gloss, there is too much waste when you get to the end. I want to be able to get every last drop out and I have yet to find a brand that will allow that to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shade. Just a little pink but not ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Jane

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gloss
customer_reviews.text: Very rich, smooth color, doesn't last 8 hours but longer than regular gloss.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, light color that stays on...
customer_reviews.text: Love this gloss, it stays on and the color is a nice soft color. I use the lip liner first then apply this gloss and it stays on through coffee drinking for about 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: snorkie

customer_reviews.title: Makes my lips feel great instead of drying them out
customer_reviews.text: Very moist and stays on for quite a while. Makes my lips feel great instead of drying them out.
customer_reviews.author: Mom 101

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it. It is heavy
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it. It is heavy, sticky, practically transparent and lasts for maximally an hour if you're not eating. If you are, comes right off
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: I love this lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip gloss... been using it for years and will continue to use it. It' not to dark and not too light...
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks good and lasts
customer_reviews.text: So excited to get this. Works great, looks good and lasts long
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Young

customer_reviews.title: Try all colors!
customer_reviews.text: Stayed on all day. No problem with it at all. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: BW1017

customer_reviews.title: amazing color
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Great color and last a long time. The only thing I am not in love with is how long it feels stick and wet on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on this color. It's my favorite shade. I've ordered this again and again!
customer_reviews.author: marintravelbuff

customer_reviews.title: Iridescent color
customer_reviews.text: Iridescent color works well as just a gloss or over lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Nugget

customer_reviews.title: I love all infallible lipglosses
customer_reviews.text: I love all infallible lipglosses. Last as long as my MAC but it glides on much easier than MAC.
customer_reviews.author: NCM

product_meta.title: L’Oreal Paris Makeup Infallible 8 Hour Hydrating Lip Gloss, Barely Nude, 0.5 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Color:Barely NudeInfallible 8HR Le Gloss is a hydrating formula that keeps lips soft, smooth, colorful and glossy for eight shining hours. The patented Petit Couer applicator contours lips precisely, giving you a smooth, even, flawless finish every time.Long-lasting look. No top coats. No feathering. No fading. It has to be Infallible.

BRAND STORY
By L'Oreal Paris
feature_bullets: Long Lasting Lip Gloss: This hydrating formula keeps lips soft, smooth, colorful and glossy for 8 shining hours. The patented Petit Couer applicator contours lips precisely, giving you a smooth, flawless finish
The Proof is in the Wear: Available in 20 shades, from nudes to bold reds, that provide luminous color for hours. Use it together with Infallible Never Fail Makeup for a long-lasting look
Luminize Your Lips: Our lip glosses offer high shine without compromising on how long they last on the lips. Our hydrating formulas leave lips feeling soft and moisturized

All Things Beauty: Keep your beauty stash stocked with the best! We have a variety of products to help you achieve any look - whether you need eye makeup for a killer cat eye or face makeup for a flawless complexion
L'Oreal Innovation: As the biggest beauty brand in the world, we have an unparalleled commitment to combining the latest in technology with the highest in quality for the ultimate in luxury beauty
